title: Reminder Management
subtitle: Schedule and manage automatic event reminders
description: Schedule and manage automatic event reminders
createDescription: Schedule automatic WhatsApp and Email reminders for upcoming events
createReminderDesc: Schedule automatic WhatsApp and Email reminders for upcoming events
oneWeekBeforeDesc: Sent 7 days before the event at 8:00 AM (GST)
oneDayBeforeDesc: Sent 1 day before the event at 8:00 AM (GST)
weeklyEveryMondayDesc: Sent every Monday at 8:00 AM (GST) until the event
dailyLast7DaysDesc: Sent daily at 8:00 AM (GST) for the 7 days before the event
morningOfEventDesc: Sent on the morning of the event at 8:00 AM (GST)
viewManageReminders: View and manage all scheduled event reminders
scheduledRemindersDesc: View and manage all scheduled event reminders
deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the reminder for {{eventName}}?
deleteReminderConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this reminder?
reminderScheduled: The reminder has been scheduled successfully
reminderCreatedDesc: The reminder has been scheduled successfully
reminderRemoved: The reminder has been removed successfully
reminderDeletedDesc: The reminder has been removed successfully
reminderResentDesc: The reminder will be resent immediately

descriptions.1_week: Sent 7 days before the event at 8:00 AM (GST)
descriptions.1_day: Sent 1 day before the event at 8:00 AM (GST)
descriptions.weekly: Sent every Monday at 8:00 AM (GST) until the event
descriptions.daily: Sent daily at 8:00 AM (GST) for the 7 days before the event
descriptions.morning_of: Sent on the morning of the event at 8:00 AM (GST)
